cgcloud__Workflow__c.name: cgcloud__Workflow__c
cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Stores the attributes of the workflow.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Recent_State_Policy__c.description: This attribute controls the creation of the Recent State data records for the workflow. If the attribute is selected as No, the system doesn't create a Recent State data record when the business object reaches a new state.

cgcloud__Usage__c.description: Module or business object in which the workflow can be used.
